channel.title: Github on Sandors Systems Scribbles
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Sandors Systems Scribbles

item.title: Post to octopress and deploy to Github pages
item.description: The Goal Use Jekyll & octopress to post to Sandors Systems Scribbles which is hosted on GitHub Pages (where you are now) not anymore, Sandors HowTo notebook has been moved to Amazon AWS The Links Jekyll - link OctoPress - link GitHub Pages - link Create a new post pineApplez>e30chris.github.io $rake new_post Enter a title for your post: post to octopress and deploy to github pages mkdir -p source/_posts Creating new post: source/_posts/2013-11-12-post-to-octopress-and-deploy-to-github-pages.
